CustomField.description: Shows the Fare Range from the Account
CustomField.formula: IF ( INCLUDES ( AccountId__r.Fare_Range__c , "Public" ), "Public; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( AccountId__r.Fare_Range__c , "RIT" ), "RIT; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( AccountId__r.Fare_Range__c , "Allotment" ), "Allotment; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( AccountId__r.Fare_Range__c , "Groups" ), "Groups; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( AccountId__r.Fare_Range__c , "Concession Fares" ), "Concession Fares; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( AccountId__r.Fare_Range__c , "FIP" ), "FIP; ",null )
CustomField.label: Fare Range
